output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows an integer overflow, enabling the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens, leading to unauthorized deductions and logical inconsistencies.
The transfer function allows a user to transfer tokens to a frozen account, causing unauthorized token deductions and financial losses.
The transferFrom function allows a user to transfer tokens from a frozen account, causing unauthorized token deductions and financial losses.
The toOwner function is not protected by any access control, allowing any user to claim ownership and funds, leading to unauthorized control and financial losses.
The sell function allows an integer overflow, enabling users to sell an arbitrary amount of tokens, leading to unauthorized deductions and financial losses.
